Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.core.io

[Java] Class DefaultResourceLocator

    • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.core.io.DefaultResourceLocator
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      PluginManagerAware, ResourceLocator, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware

      public class DefaultResourceLocator

      Default ResourceLocator implementation that doesn't take into account servlet loading.

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      2.0
